sentences: Kitzbergi juttude ainealaks on ta kodukandi külaelu.
context: The word 'võetakse' in this context appears to be part of the phrase 'kust võetakse' which means 'from which'. It's used in the definition for 'aine| ala valdkond, kust võetakse kunstiloomingu, uurimistöö vms. aine, ainevald(kond)' meaning 'field, area from which material is taken for artistic work, research work etc., subject field.' The word itself means 'is taken' or 'is being taken' but in this context it's part of the prepositional phrase indicating the source or origin of the material.
